title: Academic Literacy-Integrated Mobile Microlearning

context.prior_knowledge: Basic digital device proficiency and intermediate-level job-specific expertise
context.additional_context: Integration of academic writing, data analysis, and critical thinking training optimized for mobile environments, implementing blended learning via online platforms (Moodle-based) and smartphone apps.

learning_goals: Learners can utilize three core strategies for analyzing academic texts
Learners can compose academic summaries of approximately 500 characters in mobile environments
Learners can revise and enhance drafts of job-related reports by incorporating peer feedback

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
